item.description:
MetroRock requires those who intend to climb on ropes to have passed a Belay test. If you already know how to belay, Metro will give you a test near when you arrive. If you don't, you'll need to learn prior to this meetup, and be ready to pass a Belay test.

MetroRock offers classes for new climbers (weeknights, and by Appointment). For more information, check here: MetroRock: Basic Safety Course
item.how_to_find_us: I have red hair, and glasses. I'll be wearing cords and will wait at the table.
item.name: Climb with a redhead #1
